title: Under the Urban Renewal Plan (URP) for the concerned area, prepared and notified by the Officer appo
clause_text: Under the Urban Renewal Plan (URP) for the concerned area, prepared and notified by the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority, who may revise the same as and when required; or
section: 33(9) (B): Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster of BDD chawls at Naigaon, Worli, N.M.Joshi Marg and Shivdi under Urban Renewal Scheme(s).
